scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm --filter @triplex/* --filter create-triplex-project --filter triplex-vsce build && pnpm typedef && pnpm clean:drop-dist-tests
scripts.ci:publish: pnpm build && pnpm publish --recursive --access=public && changeset tag
scripts.ci:release-electron: pnpm i --force && cross-env pnpm --filter @triplex/* --filter create-triplex-project build && pnpm --filter @triplex/electron release
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rimraf dist out targets playwright-report test-results
scripts.clean:node_modules: pnpm -r exec rimraf node_modules && rimraf node_modules
scripts.electron:build: cross-env pnpm --filter @triplex/* --filter create-triplex-project build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false pnpm --filter @triplex/electron build-target
scripts.electron:build-targets: cross-env pnpm --filter @triplex/* --filter create-triplex-project build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false pnpm --filter @triplex/electron build-targets
